item.title: Augmented Reality (AR) and Virtual Reality (VR) are showing potential in the Asia-Pacific region
item.description:
Spending on augmented reality (AR) and virtual reality (VR) in the Asia Pacific region (excluding Japan), also known as APeJ, is projected to hit $11.1 billion in 2018. This represents a significant increase of over 100% compared to the $4.6 billion spent in the previous year, according to research firm IDC.
